import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Welcome to TicketApp

About TicketApp

TicketApp is your one-stop destination for purchasing concert tickets hassle-free. Whether you're a music enthusiast or just looking for a great night out, TicketApp has you covered.

With TicketApp, you can explore a wide range of upcoming concerts and events, purchase tickets without the need to create an account, and easily search for your purchased tickets using your name.

Key Features

  • Explore and purchase tickets for upcoming concerts and events.
  • No need to register or log in to buy tickets.
  • Effortlessly find your purchased tickets by searching with your name.
  • Admin tools for event management, including adding, editing, and deleting events.
  • Stay updated with the latest events in the "All Events" section.

Contact Us

Have questions or need assistance? Feel free to contact our support team.

Email: support@ticketapp.com
Phone: 123-456-7890
